import { Form } from "react-router-dom"; import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react' export default function Contact() { const [Characters, fetchCharacters] = useState([]) const getData = () => { fetch("https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => { console.log(json['results']); fetchCharacters(json['results']) }) } useEffect(() => { getData() }, []) const handleClick = event => { // üëáÔ∏è toggle visibility console.log("have ?"); }; return (

Contacts

    {Characters.map((item, i) => { return

    • {item.name}

    • {item.species}

    • })}
) }
